TopicTitle: Big Brother now watching Kerbin! Section 6 exposed

Articles.Content:
Documents leaked today tell of an agency known only as "Section 6" that has been operating under the radar for the past 18 months.

Informants have declined to speak with the media this afternoon, fueling further speculation as to their purpose in an already saturated market.

Thus far, the kerbarithm used to encrypt the documents is proving difficult to circumvent revealing only the following image. Big Brother watching or Hoax? You decide!

![UWx6kwH.gif](http://i.imgur.com/UWx6kwH.gif)

We'll keep you posted as news comes in.
Kerbal007, are you the source of these leaks, and what are your intentions having gone public? my tinfoil hat is on standby
Ooh, you watch Continuum as well? Love that show!

Section 6 Successfully launch Orbiter\_I 72km above Kerbin!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4JMqTXurCpU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
They better not get to Duna before me! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I smell [steganography](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steganography#Digital_messages)...

![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

Edit: What?! No hidden stuff? I want a *refund!*
